mapper.insert: insert into info (userid, name, age, gender, height, weight, cellphone, address, MBTI, smoking, hobby, style, education, religion, job, filename, AIface, description) values(#{userid},#{name},#{age},#{gender},#{height},#{weight},#{cellphone},#{address},#{MBTI},#{smoking},#{hobby},#{style},#{education},#{religion},#{job},#{filename},#{AIface},#{description})
